title: Can someone please explain how the fck is this being allowed on YouTube?
selftext:
Recently, I have seen a lot of movie channels uploading 10-15 mins long movie clips on their channel and are monetized. So, I thought to do it myself but guess what, I got a copyright claim. 

Now I understand the creative commons license but I have checked, the clips of movies that they are uploading are not available on YT under creative commons license. I know they are somehow able to escape the copyright issue but just unable to understand how. 

These are some channels:

[https://www.youtube.com/@HanseeMazaak/videos](https://www.youtube.com/@HanseeMazaak/videos)

[https://www.youtube.com/@sochorecords](https://www.youtube.com/@sochorecords) (the channel name was previously Rider Studios)

[https://www.youtube.com/@lomaahipaankhao](https://www.youtube.com/@lomaahipaankhao)

[https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Kz23rOgt3H8](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Kz23rOgt3H8) (this was previously known as Aryan Music)

There are other channels too.
